thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 2 of 709
thread.title: LEON
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by LEON

author: LEON
title: LEON
text: I have used Redspot several times (Melbourne, Hobart, Adelaide) and have found their service to be very good. The cars are as specified. The only warning for the unwary is that they do not include the insurance policy in their website online booking service. This is an extra expense unless you're prepared to cough up $4000 if you have an accident. So just be aware, that although the pricing is good, it's not quite as low as you think! I will continue to hire cars from them.
